00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 #Service Provider for the air data
00004 
00005 import rospy
00006 from math import sqrt
00007 from math import atan2
00008 from math import asin
00009 from math import pow
00010 from last_letter.srv import *
00011 
00012 
00013 def calc_air_data_callback(req):
00014         u = req.speeds.x
00015         v = req.speeds.y
00016         w = req.speeds.z
00017         
00018         airspeed = sqrt(pow(u,2)+pow(v,2)+pow(w,2))
00019         alpha = atan2(w,u)
00020         if u==0:
00021                 if v==0:
00022                         beta=0
00023                 else:
00024                         beta=asin(copysign(1,v))
00025         else:
00026                 beta = atan2(v,u)
00027         return (airspeed, alpha, beta)
00028 
00029 if __name__=='__main__':
00030         rospy.init_node('calc_air_data_server')
00031         s = rospy.Service('calc_air_data', calc_air_data, calc_air_data_callback)
00032         rospy.loginfo('calc_air_data service running')
00033         rospy.spin()
